Business Consulting & FP&A Services

Welcome to Sadh & Associates, where we specialize in providing top-notch Consulting and Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) services. Our mission is to empower your business with the insights and strategies needed to drive growth, enhance efficiency, and achieve financial success.

Talk to a Consultant Today! (212) 760-1124 Contact Us

Business Consulting Services

At Sadh & Associates, we offer a comprehensive range of consulting services designed to help you navigate complex business challenges and seize new opportunities. Our experienced consultants work closely with you to develop tailored strategies that drive sustainable growth and operational excellence

Our clients also benefit from the enhanced communications and streamlined internal processes of our firm proprietary technology systems, audit protocols and processes. Our use of technology has enhanced our efficiency and electronic work papers.

In addition to Not for Profit organization financial statement audits, our firm also provides audit services for several other businesses that include apparel industry, medical service and healthcare providers.

List of Services:

Business Services

  • Business Strategy Development: Crafting actionable strategies to achieve your business goals.
  • Operational Efficiency Improvement: Streamlining processes to enhance productivity and reduce costs.
  • Market Research and Analysis: Providing in-depth market insights to inform your business decisions.
  • Change Management: Guiding your organization through transitions to ensure successful implementation.
  • Risk Management: Identifying and mitigating potential risks to safeguard your business.
  • Business Process Management (BPM) & ERP Implementation:
    • Chart of Accounts Setup: Structuring your chart of accounts to align with your company's hierarchy.
    • Cost Center Setup: Establishing cost centers for effective financial tracking and reporting.
    • ERP Implementation: Integrating enterprise resource planning systems tailored to your business needs.
    • Workflow Automation: Automating key business processes to improve efficiency.
    • Software Customization: Customizing software solutions to fit your unique business processes.
    • Data Migration and Integration: Ensuring seamless data transfer and integration between systems.
    • User Training and Support: Providing comprehensive training and ongoing support for your team.

FP&A Services

Our FP&A services are designed to provide you with the financial insights and analysis necessary to make informed decisions. We offer a range of services that help you plan, forecast, and manage your finances effectively, ensuring long-term financial stability and success.

List of Services:

Financial Services

  • Financial Forecasting: Predicting future financial performance to guide strategic planning.
  • Budgeting and Planning: Developing comprehensive budgets and plans to align with your business goals.
  • Financial Modeling: Creating detailed financial models to evaluate different scenarios and make data-driven decisions.
  • Performance Reporting: Monitoring and reporting on key financial metrics to track progress and identify areas for improvement.
  • Cash Flow Management: Ensuring optimal cash flow to support your business operations and growth.

Integration of BPM, ERP Implementation, and FP&A

At Sadh & Associates, we understand that effective Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) relies heavily on a robust and well-structured accounting system. This is why our Consulting Services and FP&A Services are designed to work hand in hand. Our Business Process Management (BPM) and ERP Implementation services ensure that your accounting setup, including the chart of accounts and cost centers, is meticulously aligned with your organizational hierarchy and operational needs. This foundational setup is crucial for accurate financial tracking, reporting, and analysis. By integrating BPM and ERP Implementation with FP&A, we provide you with a comprehensive financial management solution. This seamless integration allows for:

Benefits of Financial Management

  • Enhanced Data Accuracy: Ensuring that financial data is consistent and reliable across all systems.
  • Improved Financial Visibility: Offering a clear view of financial performance through detailed and accurate reports.
  • Informed Decision-Making: Providing the insights needed to make strategic decisions based on solid financial data.
  • Operational Efficiency: Streamlining processes and reducing manual efforts, leading to cost savings and increased productivity.

With our holistic approach, you can be confident that your financial management is built on a strong foundation, enabling you to achieve your business objectives effectively.

Other Services

  • SEC reporting & compliance
  • Forecasts and projections
  • Agreed-upon procedures
  • Reports on internal controls
  • Process and procedure reviews
  • Performance measurement, including benchmarking
  • Assurance of regulatory requirement compliance
  • Feasibility studies
